Description: High-performance laptop with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD.
RGB mechanical keyboard with tactile switches.
Ergonomic wireless mouse with long battery life.
Over-ear gaming headset with noise-cancelling microphone.
Portable 1TB SSD for fast data transfer.
Full HD webcam for video conferencing.
Advanced smartwatch with heart rate monitoring and GPS.
Compact Bluetooth speaker with rich bass.
Ergonomic gaming chair with adjustable lumbar support.
